job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>JOB DESCRIPTION</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Apply advanced machine learning, deep learning and NLP/NLU techniques to build cutting edge AI applications</li><li>Use effective text representation techniques to develop useful features</li><li>Write production-ready code in Python, applying coding and OOP best practices</li><li>Develop and deliver software using Python and various AI related libraries, applying the corporate SDLC and support continuous integration and continuous deployment of the micro-services. Use containerization, orchestration, DevOps for faster delivery and easier maintenance</li><li>Define and implement evaluation strategies for each required functionality, demonstrate applicability and performance of the delivered application, and communicate clearly on its limits</li><li>Collaborate with the various teams,&nbsp;present plans, ideas and deliverables.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Job Qualification:</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree in computer science, mathematics, or related field</li><li>At least one year of experience as a natural language processing engineer</li><li>Knowledge of data structures, semantic extraction, and modelling</li><li>Knowledge of text representation (e.g., n-grams, sentiment analysis, bag of words, etc.)</li></ul>
